g4p_controls

Class StyledString.TextLayoutHitInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p_controls.StyledString.TextLayoutHitInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<StyledString.TextLayoutHitInfo>
    Enclosing class:
    StyledString

    public static class StyledString.TextLayoutHitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<StyledString.TextLayoutHitInfo>
    For multi-line text, the TextHitInfo class is not enough. We also need information about the layout so that the caret(s) can be drawn.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
